title: Rippling
description: Rippling is the workforce management platform that eliminates the friction from running a business. With Rippling, all your data related to people, processes, and systems is in one place. It flows directly into Ripplingâ€™s business applications, giving every team a shared source of truth, the power to automate tasks, and access to the insights they need, so you can accelerate business execution and run more efficiently.
